moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Twineedle
moves.description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Rage
moves.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opponent's feet. They poison opponents that switch into battle.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises sharply.
